questions.question: How many 'Lord of the Rings' movie-parts exist?
questions.description: The fellowship of the ring, The two towers, The return of the king

questions.description: Middle-earth is the name of the fictional world

questions.description: Théoden is the king of Rohan

questions.description: Samwise is the first hobbit to get married

questions.question: Samwise marries whom?
questions.description: Sam marries Rosie Cotton, Lily Brown was Rosies mother, and Elanor Gardner was the daughter of Samwise and Rosie

questions.question: How many members make up the fellowship of the ring?
questions.description: This fellowship of the ring consists of Frodo (and his fellow hobbits) Merry, Sam, and Pippin,(two Men) Aragorn and Boromir,  Legolas (Elf), Gimli (Dwarf) and Gandalf.

questions.question: How many Rings of Power were there, in total?
questions.description: Three Rings for the Elven-kings under the sky, Seven for the Dwarf-lords in their halls of stone, Nine for Mortal Men, doomed to die, One for the Dark Lord on his dark throne In the Land of Mordor where the Shadows lie. One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them, One Ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them.In the Land of Mordor where the Shadows lie.
